channel.title: RagaDecode - Indian Armed Forces
channel.description: Latest articles in Indian Armed Forces

item.title: BREAKING: IAF Jaguar Fighter Jet Crashes in Rajasthan’s Churu – Pilots Feared Dead in Third Mishap This Year
item.dc:creator: Ragavendran Ramesh
item.description: IAF Jaguar crash in Rajasthan claims 2 pilots - third incident in 2025. Analysis reveals dangers of India's aging fighter fleet, maintenance challenges, and urgent need for modernization to prevent future tragedies.
